english.title: Kundli Matching
english.description: Comprehensive pre-marriage compatibility report based on birth charts, including Gun Milan, Mangal Dosha, planetary positions, and relationship harmony.

english.title: Vastu Puja Muhurat
english.description: Best date and ritual method for house or office entry, includes detailed Vastu Puja guidance via online/offline mode.

english.title: Energized Gemstone Delivery
english.description: Receive purified and astrologically energized gemstones at home to reduce planetary doshas and invite positivity.

english.title: Online Dosha Nivaran Puja
english.description: Live-streamed pujas by expert priests for Rahu-Ketu, Mangal, Kaal Sarp, or Pitru dosha remedies.

english.title: Business Problem Solution
english.description: Astrological solutions, gemstones, and pujas for resolving recurring losses or growth issues in your business.

english.title: Relationship Problem Solution
english.description: Resolve love, marriage delays, or spousal disputes through customized astrological remedies.

english.title: Study Abroad Yoga
english.description: Check if your horoscope indicates success in studying abroad and learn remedies to boost your chances.

english.title: Money Leakage Solution
english.description: Identify planetary or Vastu doshas causing financial instability despite good income; get effective remedies.

english.title: Own House Yoga
english.description: Know the right time and remedies to successfully purchase your dream home through horoscope analysis.

english.title: Family Problem Solution
english.description: Remedies, pujas, and planetary healing to resolve domestic disputes, disagreements, and health concerns in the family.
